song.title: Kyrie
song.lyrics:
[V1] Lord Jesus, Son of the living God, you have shown us the way to the Father: Lord, have mercy.
Kyrie, Kyrie eleison.
[V2] Lord Jesus, you have given us the consolation of the truth: Christ, have mercy.
Christe eleison.
[V3] Lord Jesus, you are the Good Shepherd, leading us into everlasting life. Lord, have mercy.
Kyrie, Kyrie eleison.
